
Guide for System Administrators
*******************************

TIND Technologies contributes to the Invenio Software`s official system administration guide. This guide is found `here`_.

.. _here: http://invenio.readthedocs.org/en/latest/admin/index.html


The list below contains guidelines which is not yet fully merged.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1


   bibsort-admin-guide
